properties.description: Open from 04/10/22. All are welcome. A small play area for children who must be supervised by parents and carers. Parking is usually possible in the local streets. Limited phone charging facilities.

properties.description: Games, activities, friendship and a cuppa. Come and join us for free coffee & cake, a warm bowl of homemade soup and a delicious pud!  Everyone welcome we’d love to see you.
properties.title: Connections @ Holy Trinity

properties.description: Open from 31st October 2022. Join us for free tea and coffee, biscuits and a warm welcome - there are craft activities to have a go at, jigsaws and puzzle books, or simply grab a cuppa and have a chat. Everyone is welcome.
